products.name: a New Era of AI-Powered Displays")

details.availability: - The monitors were first unveiled at CES 2025 in January and are now available for purchase in the U.S. market[2][3].
keyFeatures: The **Samsung 2025 Smart Monitor lineup**, branded as a new era of AI-powered displays, features **premium 4K QD-OLED technology** combined with advanced AI capabilities designed for versatile use in work, play, and streaming from a single screen[1][2].
- **Connectivity:** Seamless integration with Samsung’s AI ecosystem and compatibility with Microsoft Copilot for personalized content and productivity features[3].
- **Additional AI Features:** Samsung Vision AI technology across the lineup, enabling personalized, adaptive screen experiences that simplify and enrich daily use[3].

- Exact retail prices have not been explicitly stated in the sources but are positioned as premium monitors with advanced features, suggesting a higher price tier consistent with 4K QD-OLED technology and AI integration[1][2].

products.name: a New Era of AI-Powered Displays](https://news

keyFeatures: - **AI Features:** Vision AI Companion powered by generative AI enables conversational interactions, personalized recommendations, and smarter multi-device communication with an upgraded Bixby 2 voice assistant.

- Specific pricing details for the 2025 OLED lineup have not been publicly announced yet. However, Samsung has offered promotions such as $100 off qualifying TVs or soundbars for early sign-ups during the CES 2025 launch period, indicating premium pricing consistent with flagship OLED TVs.
- The Galaxy S25 series, which also features advanced AI displays, is set for unveiling on January 22, 2025.

products.name: a New Era of AI-Powered Displays")

details.availability: - The 2025 Smart Monitor lineup was announced as available for reservation starting **June 9, 2025**.
keyFeatures: The "Samsung: A New Era of AI-Powered Displays" refers primarily to Samsung's 2025 Smart Monitor lineup and AI-powered TV displays unveiled with advanced AI features under the Samsung Vision AI initiative.
- The 2025 Smart Monitors feature **premium 4K QD-OLED technology** for superior picture quality.
- They include **AI Picture Optimizer**, an industry-first feature built directly into the display that performs real-time visual optimization without needing a separate PC.

- Specific MSRP pricing for individual models has not been detailed in the available information but pre-order incentives indicate a premium pricing tier consistent with 4K QD-OLED and AI features[1][2].

- These 2025 displays represent a significant upgrade over previous Samsung Smart Monitors and TVs by integrating **on-device AI for real-time picture optimization**, a feature not present in earlier models.

products.name: ‘SmartThings Meets AI Home’ Campaign Ahead of IFA 2025](https://img

keyFeatures: - **AI Home Display:** Appliances feature 7-inch or 9-inch LCD AI Home screens (e.g., on refrigerators) that serve as central control hubs, enabling interaction with devices and displaying personalized information like calendars and daily boards.
- **Care Features:** Proactive maintenance alerts and family care monitoring (e.g., alerts if no movement is detected) enhance user safety and convenience.
- Specific pricing details for the Bespoke AI appliances or the SmartThings Meets AI Home campaign have not been publicly disclosed in the available sources as of September 2025.
- This solution is unique in its deep integration of AI-powered natural language processing and real-time analytics tailored specifically for professional football sideline use.
